content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: lime_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "cyan_dye", "quantity": 30, "index": 10}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 31, "index": 12}, {"type": "golden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 28}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral", "quantity": 51, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft lime_terracotta, I need to place 8 terracotta blocks in a ring around a lime dye block. The lime dye block must be placed in the center of the crafting table. Therefore, I will move the terracotta block from slot 28 to slot 1, which is the top left corner of the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: lime_terracotta

thought: I have already placed a terracotta block in the top left corner of the crafting table, so I will move another one to the top middle slot (2).
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 2 with quantity 1
